text: The 1987 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy (USNA) during the 1987 NCAA Division I-A football season. Navy competed as an independent with no conference affiliation. The team was led by first-year head coach Elliott Uzelac. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==Game summaries== ===Army=== Starting offensive lineman Matt Felt and Joe Brennan were held out of the game due to what head coach Elliot Uzelac called "an administrative matter not related to football". ==References== Navy Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Navy Midshipmen football
title: 1987 Navy Midshipmen football team
